```plaintext
if_else(ts_rank(ts_delta(close / ts_mean(close, 20), 2) > 0.5, 1, 0) == 1, ts_decay_linear(close - ts_mean(close, 50)), NaN)
```
This strategy identifies potential buy points in cryptocurrencies by crossing a short-term moving average (20-day) with a long-term moving average (50-day). The signal is generated only when the short-term MA is above the long-term MA for two consecutive days.

This strategy combines technical indicators with sentiment analysis data. It triggers trades when the sentiment score is positive and indicates an upward trend in price.

```plaintext
if_else(ts_rank(ts_delta(high / ts_mean(volume, 50), 2) > 0.5, 1, 0) == 1, close - ts_min(close, 30), NaN)
```
This strategy identifies bullish breakouts by detecting instances where the highest price in the last 50 days is higher than the average closing price over a 30-day period. The signal is triggered when these conditions are met.
